name: lantern_bottom_up_analysis
description: Structured analysis for a single source file. Each field maps to Lantern's bottom-up template.

summary.description: Concise overview of what the file or code block does (4000 characters max).

key_insights.description: Key takeaways from the file that explain important patterns, constraints, or behaviors.

functions.description: Important functions or procedures in the file, each with a short note about its purpose.

classes.description: Classes or types declared in this file plus a brief summary of their responsibility.

flow.description: Describe the most important control or data flow that involves this file (2000 characters).

flow_diagram.description: A Mermaid flowchart or sequence diagram showing the most important control/data flow. Use graph TD or sequenceDiagram syntax. Do NOT include fenced code block delimiters. Keep it concise with 5-10 nodes max.

references.description: Paths, line ranges, or components referenced when summarizing this file.

language.description: Target language code for this summary (e.g., 'en', 'zh-TW').
